entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
